com.poesys.accounting.dataloader.properties

Interface IParameters

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PropertyFileParameters

    public interface IParameters
    Interface that allows a client to get the parameters of the data loader; implementations may read properties from a file or provide properties directly from the implementation for unit testing; the get-reader methods provide an interface for unit testing without reading files
    Author:
    Robert J. Muller

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.Reader getAccountGroupReader(java.lang.Integer year)
      Get a reader for the account group data.
      java.io.Reader getAccountMapReader(java.lang.Integer year)
      Get a reader for the account-map data.
      java.io.Reader getAccountReader(java.lang.Integer year)
      Get a reader for the account data.
      java.io.Reader getBalanceReader(java.lang.Integer year)
      Get a reader for the balance data.
      java.lang.Integer getEndYear()
      Get the year number of the last fiscal year to load; the loader will load all years from the start year to the end year.
      java.lang.String getEntity()
      Get the name of the accounting entity to load.
      java.io.Reader getItemReader(java.lang.Integer year)
      Get a reader for the item data.
      java.lang.String getPath()
      Get the file path to the input data files; this path points to a directory that contains a set of fiscal year subdirectories, each of which contains the standard set of accounting data files
      java.io.Reader getReimbursementReader(java.lang.Integer year)
      Get a reader for the reimbursement data.
      java.lang.Integer getStartYear()
      Get the year number of the first fiscal year in the sequence; this must correspond to one year subdirectory in the file path; the data loader will load balances from this year.
      java.io.Reader getTransactionReader(java.lang.Integer year)
      Get a reader for the transaction data.

    • Method Detail

      • getPath

        java.lang.String getPath()
        Get the file path to the input data files; this path points to a directory that contains a set of fiscal year subdirectories, each of which contains the standard set of accounting data files
        Returns:
        the file path

      • getEntity

        java.lang.String getEntity()
        Get the name of the accounting entity to load.
        Returns:
        the entity name

      • getStartYear

        java.lang.Integer getStartYear()
        Get the year number of the first fiscal year in the sequence; this must correspond to one year subdirectory in the file path; the data loader will load balances from this year.
        Returns:
        the first fiscal year of the sequence

      • getEndYear

        java.lang.Integer getEndYear()
        Get the year number of the last fiscal year to load; the loader will load all years from the start year to the end year.
        Returns:
        the last fiscal year of the sequence
